languages.text: {n}Оборванец качает головой и прикрывает лицо морщинистыми ладонями.{/n} "С-с-сер...фитор. Утилис-сация".

traits.locale_text: {n}Оборванец качает головой и прикрывает лицо морщинистыми ладонями.{/n} "С-с-сер...фитор. Утилис-сация".
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}The ragged man shakes his head and covers his face with his wrinkled hands.{/n} "S-s-servitor... Disp-po-posal!"

languages.text: {n}这个衣衫褴褛的人摇了摇头，满是皱纹的手遮住了他的脸。{/n}“机仆……配件！”
languages.original_text: {n}The ragged man shakes his head and covers his face with his wrinkled hands.{/n} "S-s-servitor... Disp-po-posal!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个衣衫褴褛的人摇了摇头，满是皱纹的手遮住了他的脸。{/n}“奴工……配件！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldMan

languages.text: {n}El hombre andrajoso niega con la cabeza y se cubre el rostro con sus manos arrugadas.{/n} «S-s-servidor... ¡E-e-eliminación!».
languages.original_text: {n}The ragged man shakes his head and covers his face with his wrinkled hands.{/n} "S-s-servitor... Disp-po-posal!"

languages.text: {n}みすぼらしい男は首を振り、シワだらけの手で自分の顔を覆う。{/n}「さ、さ、さーう゛ぃたー…しょぶ、しょぶんになる！」
languages.original_text: {n}The ragged man shakes his head and covers his face with his wrinkled hands.{/n} "S-s-servitor... Disp-po-posal!"

languages.text: {n}Le pauvre hère secoue la tête et se couvre le visage de ses mains ridées.{/n} « S-Servitor... au r-r-rebut ! »

languages.text: {n}Der zerlumpte Mann schüttelt den Kopf und birgt das Gesicht in seinen faltigen Händen.{/n} "S-S-Servitor ... Ent-sor-gung!"

languages.text: {n}Pejmürde adam, başını iki yana sallayıp buruşuk elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor.{/n} "H... H... Hizmetör... İ... İmha!"
